title: [Grawood Farmstead, Field]
description: Neat rows of flowering rhubarb plants line the nearby field.  In between each row, a collection of festive yellow and blue ribbons has been strewn about in some sort of haphazardly decorative fashion that crisscrosses over the plants.  As moonlight streams down from above, the aroma of freshly dug soil permeates the air.

Neat rows of flowering rhubarb plants line the nearby field. room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
